sentences.en: Five chapters are included except preface and summarise.
sentences.cn: 除了前言及综述外,全文共包括五章.

sentences.en: I will summarise what I have done.
sentences.cn: 我将概述我所做的事情.

sentences.en: In the below we summarise annual World Steel Association crude steel production data.
sentences.cn: 下面我们在总结世界钢铁协会的年度粗钢产量数据.

sentences.en: Objective To summarise the clinical experience on transpterional approach for treatment of recirculated aneurysm by microsurgery.
sentences.cn: 目的总结翼点入路显微外科技术治疗颅内前循环动脉瘤的临床体会.

sentences.en: Summarise some brief and correct element quantity analyzing ways based on authors long experience.
sentences.cn: 作者根据多年的工作实践,总结出了一些简洁、准确的元素定量分析方法.

sentences.en: The decline and fall of the American car industry is relatively easy to summarise, and the Hummer is its reductio.
sentences.cn: 美国汽车业的衰亡相对比较容易概括总结，悍马正是美国汽车业的缩影。

sentences.en: The professional should summarise how the present case came his or her way.
sentences.cn: 专业人士应总结他们目前所从事的案件.

sentences.en: The work experience enables the author to summarise the characteristics and forms of economic duty malpractice.
sentences.cn: 根据工作实践,谈了经济职务舞弊的特点与类型及经济职务舞弊稽查中发现问题的技巧.
